title: Mathematics is the language with which God has written the universe. Can you explain? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everything can be broken down to a 1 or a 0. (ABSOLUTE FUNDAMENTALS) 1=GOD (AH)FAH-THERE [DAD] 0=GAIA (OHM)O-THERE {MOM} A=ALPHA B=BETA Y=MASCULINE ENERGY X=FEMININE ENERGY T=LINEAR TIME (GOD'S THREE ASPECTS) ζ=ZENITH (ZENIVERSE) WHERE Ω=OMEGA (UNIVERSE) WHY ∞=INFINITY(EVERVERSE) WHEN (GOD AS A WHOLE) Θ=OMNIVERSE (AWARENESS) (1×0)@ζ+(Y×X)/∞≈ Ω(αβ÷T³)/5≈°•=Θ ∞≈1{α(X×Y)}°•=0≈Θ ∞≈(1×Ω)/0°•≈Θ ∞Ω•°≈Θ ∞•° ∞ °
